response.explain: The previous action code has successfully moved the robot to the cup of yogurt without any errors. Now, the robot needs to grasp the cup of yogurt.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the cup of yogurt.
(2) Grasp the cup of yogurt.
(3) Move the robot to the cabinet.
(4) Open the cabinet.
(5) Put the cup of yogurt inside the cabinet.
(6) Close the cabinet.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Grasp the cup of yogurt
    cup_of_yogurt_88 = registry(env,"cup_of_yogurt_88")
    EasyGrasp(robot, cup_of_yogurt_88)
    donothing(env)
